description: Optional manual override for entity sensory capabilities. When present with overrideMode='manual', bypasses anatomy-based detection.

canSee.description: Whether entity can see (has functioning visual sense)

canHear.description: Whether entity can hear (has functioning auditory sense)

canSmell.description: Whether entity can smell (has functioning olfactory sense)

canFeel.description: Whether entity can feel touch (tactile sense, typically always true)

overrideMode.description: When 'manual', these values override anatomy detection. When 'auto', anatomy is checked first.
